allow: Bash(node -e "const { createClient } = require\(''@supabase/supabase-js''\); require\(''dotenv''\).config\({ path: ''.env'' }\); const supabase = createClient\(process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY\); async function check\(\) { const { data } = await supabase.from\(''documents''\).select\(''metadata''\).ilike\(''metadata->>source'', ''%YT8522%''\).or\(''content.ilike.%clock%,content.ilike.%CLKIN%''\); const pages = [...new Set\(data.map\(d => parseInt\(d.metadata.page\)\)\)].sort\(\(a,b\) => a-b\); console.log\(''包含时钟信息的YT8522文档页码:'', pages.join\('', ''\)\); } check\(\);")
